snippet.title: Monospaced Lovers — Demo v2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:

Email: https://mailchi.mp/2edf102a8670/monospaced-lovers

► TRY THE DEMO
itch.io: https://scarletstring.itch.io/monospaced-lovers
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/monospaced-lovers/501345

► STORY
Clara wakes up to a phone that isn't hers.

On it, she finds a perplexing message left by a hacker named the Gòd o͏f̴ B̴in͠a̸r̨y̧, stating that her time left in this world is short. Her only clue is a series of encrypted messages locked on the device — and a mysterious new friend who woke up to a phone that wasn't his.

What does this enigmatic hacker want? Why is he talking about the end of the world? And what does any of this have to do with Clara's quaint and peaceful life in Haven Heights?

All we know for sure is that if she doesn't embark on this quest... her friends will drag her into it anyway.

► DESCRIPTION
Monospaced Lovers is an indie game for PC, Mac, and Linux. It's a puzzle platformer featuring hand-drawn anime art, head-scratching puzzles, and an expressive soundtrack that blends modern instruments with old-school, chiptune-style accents. Above all, Monospaced Lovers is unabashedly a narrative game, with over 50,000 words of dialogue, a non-silent heroine who plays a large role in the story, and a whole world filled with strange friends and stranger enemies. If you enjoy emotional, character-driven stories like To the Moon, Undertale, or the films of Makoto Shinkai (e.g. Your Name), then you'll surely find something to enjoy in this game.

If all goes well, we'd love to port the game to the Xbox One, PS4, and Nintendo Switch. But, we can't promise a console launch yet. For now, please enjoy the game DRM-free on Steam, itch.io, and possibly other storefronts.
